name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Stacey V. MONTGOMERY, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Stacey V. MONTGOMERY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
The judgment of sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Vito F. Canuso, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler and Ellen Mattleman, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
428 A.2d 1337
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Stacey V. MONTGOMERY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 24, 1981.
Decided May 11, 1981.
Vito F. Canuso, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler and Ellen Mattleman, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
